fr.iutvalence.m2107.p24.rooms

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.iutvalence.m2107.p24.rooms.Room
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BossRoom, KeyRoom, RoomDisplay

    public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    Represent a room and all of his component (doors, position, ...).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAX_ITEMS
      The maximal number of items on a room.
      static int MAX_MOBS
      The maximum amount of mobs that can spawn at the same time on a room.

      The maximal number of trees on a room.
      static int MIN_TREES
      The minimal number of trees on a room.

      • Room

        public Room(Position p)
        Create a new Room, fully close. Generate some mobs, items and decoration on it.
        Parameters:
        p - The position of the room on the map.

      • Room

        public Room(Position p,
            java.lang.String config)
        Create a room with a specific configuration.
        Parameters:
        p - The position of the room on the map.
        config - The doors' configuration. (i.e. "0110");
        See Also:
        getDoors()

      • setDoor

        public void setDoor(Direction d,
                    boolean b)
        Set the door open or not depending on a given direction.
        Parameters:
        d - the direction of the door.
        b - if true the door is open; otherwise the door is close.
